description:
HTTP request context for audit/logging

Captures metadata about the HTTP request that triggered an action. Used for security auditing, rate limiting, and debugging.

## Usage

Embed in types that need request tracking: ```rust,ignore pub struct AuditLogEntry { // ... other fields #[serde(flatten)] pub request_context: RequestContext} ```

## Fields Replaced

This component replaces the common pattern of: - `pub ip_address: Option<String>` - `pub user_agent: Option<String>`

ip_address.description: Client IP address (may be from X-Forwarded-For in proxied environments)
